comment: Another way to express existential uniqueness of a wff ` ph ` : its associated class abstraction ` { x | ph } ` is a singleton. Variant of ~ euabsn2 using existential uniqueness for the singleton element instead of existence only. (Contributed by AV, 24-Aug-2022.)
